articles.title: About this blog
articles.contents:
Just Some Data is a blog about everyday questions being explored with public data. It’s a space where contributors take a shot at learning something new about the world, while also trying to communicate those ideas through data.
We hope you enjoy what we create. Enjoy.

articles.title: Contributors
articles.contents:
The people that make Just Some Data special.
Name
Bio
Matthew Lavallee
Matthew studied Economics and Mathematics at Hampshire College, and now does Medicaid research as a Economics Pre-doctoral Fellow with the Tobin Center/Yale’s School of Public Health.
Larissa Holland
Larissa studied both Environmental Science and Policy (ES&P) & Architecture at Smith College. She currently works as a Project Manager at Resonant Energy, a Boston-based solar developer working to help under-invested communities take their place at the forefront of the global transition to clean energy.
